title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Election) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 5) Order, 2020
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 359
Gazette dated Friday, 26th June, 2020
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 61 of 2020
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 5) Order, 2020
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Election) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 5)
Order, 2020.
2. A candidate for election as a councillor in a district and Date and
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the time of
nominations
returning officer on Thursday, 9th July, 2020, between 09:00 hours for elections
and 15:00 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 9th July, Campaign
period
2020 at 15:00 hours and close at 18:00 hours on Wednesday, 29th
July, 2020.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a councilor in a district and Election date
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday, 30th and time of
poll
July, 2020, between 06:00 hours and 18:00 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district and ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
360 Statutory Instruments 26th June, 2020
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs 2 and 4)
ELECTION FOR COUNCILLORS
District Constituency Ward No. Name
Serenje Muchinga 101011010 Chibale
Chienge Chienge 104002006 Katete
Chavuma Chavuma 108001007 Chavuma
Kasempa Kasempa 108004002 Nyako
Kasempa Kasempa 108004007 Lubofu
Mongu Nalikwanda 110007022 Nakaya
Limulunga Luena 110003001 Limulunga
Limulunga Luena 110003006 Sitoya
Sesheke Sesheke 110013008 Silumbu
Sesheke Sesheke 110013009 Imusho
Sioma Sioma 110016003 Nangweshi
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia this 23rd day of June, 2020.
JUSTICE E. CHULU,
Chairperson
JUSTICE E. J. SIKAZWE,
Member
JUSTICE A. D. SIMWINGA,
LUSAKA Member
[EC/101/5/5 CONF.]
